scripts.dev:css: npx tailwind build src/assets/css/main.css -c tailwind.config.js -o dist/css/tailwind.css
scripts.build:css: npx postcss src/assets/css/main.css -o dist/css/tailwind.min.css;cp src/index.html dist;cp -r src/assets/images dist/;cp -r node_modules/tw-elements/dist/js/index.min.js dist/js
